name: Dog Psychologist
description:
This is a prototype. Expect bugs.

Dog Psychologist is a third–person adventure game set in a small town.Wander the streets, talk to people and feed the furry protagonist. Look at the world through the eyes of a dog and find people who need your help. When you meet people, listen to them, maybe they will thank you.

Used assets:

Lighthouse by Poly by Google [CC-BY], via Poly Pizza

"Dog House Free" by donnichols is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution.

Jana Ju - "Primavera" (Ludovico Einaudi)

Controls:

Move - WASD 

Jump - Space

F - To Chat

E - To Eat

ESC - Exit

Future updates: 

Add new location,

Add sound,

Add new Story,

Add more animations.

Bug report:

There are bugs in the texts, as well as the game is not finished yet. Since I didn't have time in time for jam, I had to hurry.
